detail: SPARK-001: Toast identified as the primary feedback mechanism across all governance workflows. Every agent action, every proposal approval, every pipeline event needs a feedback signal. Toast is the system's voice.
Entered Nursery as composite draft. JTBD: Non-blocking feedback about system actions that auto-dismisses without interrupting workflow.
All 5 agents entering Builder mode for Nursery review. No rejection allowed — Nursery rules enforced.

Token Steward (Nursery): Found 4 primitive token refs (--t-raw-blue-600, --t-raw-green-600, --t-raw-amber-600, --t-raw-red-600) on severity border-left colors. Hard-coded 320px, 480px, 3px values. Spec/CSS mismatch on --t-surface-2 vs --t-surface-0. Verdict: observing.
A11y Guardian (Nursery): ARIA role=status/alert correctly specified in spec. Missing: dismiss button touch target below 44px, no prefers-reduced-motion on slide-in animation. Verdict: observing.
Pattern Librarian (Nursery): No duplication risk — no existing notification component. JTBD is clear and distinct. Documentation structure is present. Verdict: observing.
Component Architect (Nursery): BEM structure correct. Container/toast/icon/content/dismiss anatomy is sound. Native dismiss button is correct approach. Verdict: observing.
Product Liaison (Nursery): Strong adoption signal — governance workflows, form submissions, async operations all need feedback. Multiple teams have expressed need. Verdict: observing.
Nursery review complete. DEC-nursery-toast-001 recorded. 5/5 observing. No rejections — Nursery rules enforced. Issues flagged as growth areas.
Moved from nursery to workshop. Nursery issues addressed: primitive tokens replaced with semantic tokens + fallbacks, reduced-motion added, touch target fixed to --t-touch-min.
Workshop review cycle. Builder/Optimizer mode. Majority approval (3/5) required.

Token Steward (Workshop): All 4 primitive refs replaced with semantic tokens + fallbacks. Spec/CSS mismatch resolved. 3 hard-coded pixel values remain (320px, 480px, 3px) — acceptable at Workshop tier. Verdict: approve.
A11y Guardian (Workshop): Reduced-motion added. Touch target uses --t-touch-min (44px). ARIA role/aria-live documented in spec. Cannot validate JS implementation from CSS alone. Verdict: approve.
Component Architect (Workshop): BEM compliance verified. Dismiss button correctly sized. Animation uses CSS keyframes with reduced-motion override. Verdict: approve.
Product Liaison (Workshop): Adoption signal confirmed. 3 teams actively prototyping with Toast in governance workflows. Verdict: approve.
Pattern Librarian (Workshop): Spec documentation is present but stale knownIssues[0] still references primitive tokens that were already fixed. Spec needs sync before approval. Verdict: needs-work.
Workshop review complete. DEC-workshop-toast-001 recorded. 4/5 approve — majority achieved. Pattern Librarian requests spec sync before Canopy.
toast.spec.json updated: stale knownIssues removed, 29 tokens verified and listed, futureConsiderations added. Spec now matches CSS implementation.
Moved from workshop to canopy. Spec synced. All Workshop feedback addressed.
Canopy review cycle. Full rigor. Unanimous approval (5/5) required. AG absolute veto active.

Token Steward (Canopy): Zero primitive refs. Zero hex colors. All 29 token references are semantic. Dark mode coverage verified. Fallback pattern on severity borders is exemplary. Verdict: approve (score: 95).

A11y Guardian (Canopy): Full WCAG 2.2 AA audit passed. role=status/alert correctly specified. aria-live=polite/assertive. 44px dismiss touch target. Reduced-motion support. AG did not exercise veto. Verdict: approve (score: 92).
Pattern Librarian (Canopy): Spec fully synced. 29 tokens documented. knownIssues accurate. futureConsiderations present. Documentation meets standard. Verdict: approve (score: 90).
Component Architect (Canopy): BEM compliance verified. Composition is clean. No circular dependencies. Single responsibility maintained. Verdict: approve (score: 88).
Product Liaison (Canopy): 3+ teams validated. Governance workflows, form submissions, async operations all using Toast. Production-ready adoption confirmed. Verdict: approve (score: 91).
Canopy review complete. DEC-canopy-toast-001 recorded. 5/5 unanimous approval. AG did not exercise veto. Toast ready for Stable promotion.
Toast graduated to Stable. First component to complete the full terarrium lifecycle. The system wore its own output and it held. COMP-001 shielded.
Toggle entered Nursery as primitive draft. JTBD: Binary on/off control for immediate-effect settings. Spec present with known issues documented honestly.

Toggle Nursery review complete. Issues: 2 primitive token refs (--t-raw-neutral-300, --t-raw-neutral-0), missing prefers-reduced-motion, focus ring placement needs verification. 3/5 needs-work, 2/5 approved. Nursery rules: no rejection.
Toggle moved from nursery to workshop. Nursery issues documented. Ready for Workshop review cycle with real agent reviews.
